item.title: Getting Started With Spring Webflux
item.description: Most traditional applications deal with blocking calls or, in other words, synchronous calls. This means that if we want to access a particular resource in a system with most of the threads being busy, then the application would block the new one or wait until the previous threads complete processing its requests. If we want to process Big Data , however, we need to do this with immense speed and agility.
